text: The way you laugh at my terrible jokes
How you always know when something's wrong
Your voice when you're sleepy on late-night calls
How you believe in me when I don't believe in myself
The way you say my name
How you make distance feel like nothing
Your heart â€“ the kindest I've ever known
The way you care about the little things
How you make ordinary moments feel magical
Your strength when things get hard
The way you light up when you're excited
